instructions.title: How To Delete Your Showcase Cinemas Account
instructions.before: Showcase Cinemas does not explicitly tell you how to Delete their Account.  In order to ensure Deletion, please contact Customer Service through a computer browser as directed below and Request Account Deletion.
instructions.after: Customer Service will email you once your account has been Deleted Permanently.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I Delete my Showcase Cinemas Account?
qnAnswers.answer: You will loose all saved information like points associated with your account.  After Deletion you will not be able to restore any of this information so it is suggested that you use all remaining points prior to deletion.

qnAnswers.question: What should I do to ensure Deletion of My Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Because Showcase Cinema does not make it easy to delete your account it is suggested that you go in to your profile prior to deletion and change your personal information to make it useless to them.  If you change all your info then its essentially like you don't have an account anyway.

steps: [Go to the Showcase Cinemas Website] (https://www.showcasecinemas.com). If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Showcase Cinemas home page
Scroll Down and Click Contact us
Fill out the section with your Personal Information.  Make sure to include your Email address associated with the Account.
Type a Deletion Request under Message and Click Submit
